name: Workers of the Steam Plume, United!
name_original: Workers of the Steam Plume, United!
description:
The workers of the Steam Plume are rising up, but they need more firepower!

Your job as the engineer and driver duo is to open your way through the Steampunk Bourgeoisie. Evade enemy fire with your Locomotive while shooting from the Steam Engine.

Build up your energy to Unite against the power!

WASD: Move the Locomotive
LMB: Shoot from the Steam Engine
RMB: Unite!
